doc.title: Durian Degustation VIII: Durians for Japan
doc.text: Photos/JJ by/IN Cactuskit/VBG Many/JJ thanks/NNS to/TO everyone/VB who/WP came/VBD to/TO support/VB the/DT Durian/NNP Degustation/NNP and/CC for/IN your/PRP$ generous/JJ donations/NN !/. We/PRP managed/VBD to/TO raise/VB a/DT total/NN of/IN $/$ 4630/CD for/IN the/DT Red/NNP Cross/NNP Quake/NNP relief/NNP fund/NNP !/. The/DT Red/NN Cross/NN was/VBD there/RB to/TO receive/VB our/PRP$ contribution/JJ at/IN the/DT end/NN of/IN the/DT session/NN ./. Thanks/DT very/RB much/JJ to/TO Ah/NN Loon/NN and/CC Ah/NN Teck/NN for/IN their/PRP$ contribution/NN to/TO the/DT event/JJ and/CC also/RB to/TO Jimmy/NN ,/, lovejade/NN ,/, Denniz/NN for/IN helping/NN with/IN the/DT organization/NN ./. Thanks/DT also/RB to/TO Cactuskit/VB for/IN the/DT photos/NNS ./. Ah/NN Loon/NN tells/VBZ me/PRP that/WDT the/DT season/NN will/MD end/VB by/IN the/DT end/NN of/IN April/NN so/IN the/DT next/JJ degustation/NN will/MD be/VB in/IN June/NN ./. Mao/JJ Shan/NN Wan/NN season/NN will/VB peak/NN next/JJ weekend/NN ,/, so/RB do/VB head/NN down/NN to/TO Ah/NN Loon/NN Ah/NN Teck/NN at/IN East/NNP Coast/NNP Road/NNP ,/, just/RB next/JJ to/TO the/DT Mobil/JJ station/NN if/IN you/PRP need/VBP to/TO feed/VB that/IN durian/NN craving/NN ./. Ah/NN Loon/NN 's/POS HP/NN is/VBZ 97514828/RB ./. Just/RB tell/VB him/PRP you/PRP are/VBP from/IN ieatishootipost/NN and/CC he/PRP will/VB look/VB after/IN you/PRP ./.
